Content: Bribery commission officials have arrested a police constable who had attempted to take a bribe from a lorry driver who was transporting sand. The constable attached to the Boralasgamuwa police was arrested yesterday evening while on traffic duty in Maharagama area. He has attempted to take a bribe of Rs.1500 from the lorry driver when the lorry was halted for the offense of transporting sand without a license
